username.title: Emarsys API username
username.description: The username of your Emarsys API user.

password.title: Emarsys API secret
password.description: The secret of your Emarsys API user.

contact_fields.title: Contact fields
contact_fields.description: List of contact data fields to be fetched. Should be snake-cased string ID like 'zip_code' or 'birth_date'.

limit.title: API call limit
limit.description: Max number of records returned per call

recurring_contact_lists.title: Recurring contact list name patterns
recurring_contact_lists.description: Name patterns of recurring contact list. Connector will load contact data from the latest recurring list only, thus reduce API calls
